trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Blaste's fraught expression is in stark contrast to the tranquil surroundings.
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_TODO_00<tab>Search for a chestnut-haired lady.
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Blaste.

TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_000<tab>Ah, we meet again. The familiar who was with Charmion, yes? My apologies if I seem a little distracted, but I am actually in the midst of searching for someone.
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_001<tab>Oh, I don't believe we've met. As much as I would like to engage in more meaningful conversation, I am actually in the midst of searching for someone.

TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_002<tab>It's my mentor, who taught me practically everything I know. Now, she has relinquished her role and is ready to make her final journey. But before she does, there is an important matter I must convey to her.
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_003<tab>The last concept in her care─a beautiful, winged creature─has been approved for life on Etheirys!

TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_004<tab>Please, will you help me look for her? There is a strong chance you will find her at Philomythes Notos. Her most distinguishing feature is her chestnut-colored hair, tied into a single, flowing lock, much like a monoceros's tail.
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_010<tab>I have sent a familiar of my own to the north to look for my mentor. I would be very grateful if you could search elsewhere, starting with Philomythes Notos.
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287_000_020<tab>You wish to speak with me?
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287_000_021<tab>Ah, yes. I had a feeling she might say that. As I have told her, my decision has been made.
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_A1_000_001<tab>But what about that winged creature? It was a success!
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_A1_000_002<tab>Well, she can't say I didn't try.
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287_000_022<tab>Glad tidings, to be certain, but my work is done. This news was more than sufficient, and I thank you for it.

TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287_000_023<tab>Nothing can deter me from my chosen course, and I must join my predecessors in the hereafter. Tell Blaste to name the creature as she pleases... And that I wish her every happiness.
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287_000_024<tab>Now, our brief encounter has reached its end. Farewell.
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_030<tab>She's not with you...did you at least find her?

TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_031<tab>I should've known nothing would sway her. All I can do is hope she finds blessed respite in the aetherial sea...and that we may one day be reunited in another life.

TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_032<tab>Until then, I will carry on her legacy, beginning with the naming of the creature she cared for so dearly. I think I shall name it after her. That way, she will live on through her work...forever.
